sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is distributive over intersection.
message_1: Let A = {2, 4, 6, 8} and B = {1, 3, 4, 7} be two sets. Find the symmetric difference of the sets A and B. Then, find the intersection of the sets A and B. Finally, verify that the symmetric difference of A and B is distributive over the intersection of A and B.
